argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dmresexg | |- ( B e. C -> dom ( A |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( Fun A /\ B e. C ) -> dom ( A |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( A " B ) = ran ( A |` B ) |
| 4 |  | #P_funimaexg | |- ( ( Fun A /\ B e. C ) -> ( A " B ) e. _V ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( ( Fun A /\ B e. C ) -> ran ( A |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_jca | |- ( ( Fun A /\ B e. C ) -> ( dom ( A |` B ) e. _V /\ ran ( A |` B ) e. _V ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( dom ( A |` B ) e. _V /\ ran ( A |` B ) e. _V ) -> ( dom ( A |` B ) X. ran ( A |` B ) ) e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_relres | |- Rel ( A |` B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_relssdmrn | |- ( Rel ( A |` B ) -> ( A |` B ) C_ ( dom ( A |` B ) X. ran ( A |` B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( A |` B ) C_ ( dom ( A |` B ) X. ran ( A |` B ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ssexg | |- ( ( ( A |` B ) C_ ( dom ( A |` B ) X. ran ( A |` B ) ) /\ ( dom ( A |` B ) X. ran ( A |` B ) ) e. _V ) -> ( A |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpan | |- ( ( dom ( A |` B ) X. ran ( A |` B ) ) e. _V -> ( A |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 13 | 6, 7, 12 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( Fun A /\ B e. C ) -> ( A |` B ) e. _V ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ resfunexg , shorter but requiring ~ ax-pow and ~ ax-un .  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-1995.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
